President of Tajikistan on Friendly Relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Tajikistan is following the process for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula with keen interest and positively supports the Korean people in their efforts  to peacefully achieve the country's reunification by their own efforts in the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
 Emomali Rakhmonov, president of Tajikistan, said this when receiving credentials from Ri Tong Phal, new DPRK ambassador to Tajikistan, on Dec. 13.
 He noted that Tajikistan and the DPRK have many potentialities to develop the friendly and cooperative relations and he would make efforts to expand and develop those relations in all fields.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Palestinian Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 On hand was Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.

articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The military attaches' corps here laid a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyr's Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Friday on the occasion of her 88th birth anniversary. 
 Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"

articles.content:
State Citations Awarded to Participants in Torchlight Procession
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme Peoples' Assembly of the DPRK on conferring state citations upon the participants in the torchlight procession held to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was promulgated on Wednesday. 
 The decree said that the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK awards   "Kim Il Sung Youth Honour Prizes", orders and torchlight procession commemoration medals to 58,232 participants in the procession who successfully staged it on the highest level with the firm faith and will to steadfastly make the long journey of Songun revolution under the leadership of the great Party and thus fully demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of the Party and the people around the headquarters of the revolution and the revolutionary enthusiasm of the young vanguard.    
"Kim Il Sung Youth Honour Prize" went to 40 persons, National Flag Order First Class to 9 persons, Order of Labour to 20 persons, National Flag Order Second Class to 112, National Flag Order Third Class to 280 and Torchlight Procession Commemoration Medals to 57,771, it noted.
